title: [MESSAGE BOARD ISSUE] Purchased a Summoner name change, see posts, level, icon from previous owner
body: I purchased a Summoner name change today, and on the message boards, I still see his old icon and it says he is Level 30 (NA), where I am Level 17 at the moment. Does the website take a while to update and wipe out the previous name owners content? I do see that the match history seems to be correct, showing my new games that I've just played. Please let me know how I can have this fixed. Thanks.

replies.body: It looks like making this post might have done the trick, because I'm seeing you as Level 17 now! Sometimes these boards accounts needs a gentle nudge in the right direction.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=K8gTE2AQ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-08-12T20:24:52.807+0000)
>
> It looks like making this post might have done the trick, because I'm seeing you as Level 17 now! Sometimes these boards accounts needs a gentle nudge in the right direction.

In my Boards Profile, I still see the old users' level and posts (but the icon is correctly showing mine) and the Match History link from there doesn't work (404 Error: Player not found). Also, going to the Match History link directly from the dropdown menu (not from Boards Profile) does work, but when I begin to filter, my old name shows up without an icon. I opened a Support ticket to address these issues. Thanks.
Sorry about that! I've given it another little nudge and double checked your post history, and everything should be good now!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=K8gTE2AQ,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2017-08-12T22:59:27.694+0000)
>
> Sorry about that! I've given it another little nudge and double checked your post history, and everything should be good now!

Thank you very much for your help Broporo. I have one remaining issue related to this Summoner name change. When I first go to Match History, everything appears fine, I see Yamamoto as my Summoner name and the correct icon. When I use any of the filters (for example, go to see Kayn only data), my old username reappears and the icon is a black square with a grey question mark. This is a minor issue, but it would be great if that could be fixed. Thanks again for your help, I appreciate it.

Oh.... huh yea that's another weird issue altogether. Since the normal sync I used didn't seem to work properly this time, I'm going to reach out to someone a bit higher up who can mess with your account a little more than I can. Let me know in a day or so if it's still iffy!

One more observation. Websites (LoLKing, LoLSkill, OP.GG) that compile data on Summoners all show correct data for my account under Yamamoto. None of them show data from the previous name holder, and all appear to be showing data that I created under the previous name, as I'd expect. Is it possible that this is a caching issue with this website in particular, and once the cache is refreshed, the previous owners data won't show anymore? I believe that the source of data for this website and for the websites I listed above would actually be the same, but I could be wrong. Please let me know, thanks.

I would like to add a little more observation. When I hover over my name in this post, it says Level 17, but the icon is certainly incorrect. I am currently using an Arcade icon. In the account menu at the top right of this website, when I click Boards Profile, then I see the previous owners posts and it says Level 30 there. Same icon though. Also, I don't see this most recent post there with the older posts.
